string.text: I heard that you sell aftermarket parts, right?

Yeah I can outfit your guns with some spare aftermarket parts and accessories we have lying around here. Remember, I'm just offering you the gear and making sure you don't fuck up installing them yourself, so if you hand me a rusty pile of junk that's what you're getting back. I can't work miracles here. And don't expect this to come cheap, we still have to source these parts ourselves and this isn't a charity case. Got all that? Alright, show me what you got and let's see if we can make something work.
An SKS Tactical kit (SKS Molot, SKS) %c[d_orange][ 12 000 RU ].
An SKS Molot kit (SKS Tactical, SKS) %c[d_orange][ 10 000 RU ].
A PKM kit like Zulu had (PKM) %c[d_orange][ 150 000 RU ].
